description: Erection of a single storey rear and side infill extension.
decision_conditions: Insufficient details of the proposed materials have been submitted to demonstrate that the proposed materials would be of a high quality so as to preserve the character and appearance of the Fairfield/Knights Park Conservation Area. Were materials of a poor quality to be used this would result in less than substantial harm to the significance of the Conservation Area, contrary to Policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS8, DM 10 and DM12 of the Core Strategy (2012) and Residential Design Guide SPD (2013) and Section 72 of The Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended) .

Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposed development would incorporate appropriate flood resistance and resilience measures so as to suitably minimise and mitigate fluvial flood risk, contrary to Policy SI12 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy (2012) and the NPPF (2023).
